general: Today, the Moon in harmony with Mercury favors clarity of mind and organization. It is the perfect time to take stock of your personal and professional projects. The energies are conducive to reflection and necessary adjustments.
love: Express your feelings sincerely to strengthen your bonds.
work: Take advantage of this day to plan your tasks and avoid procrastination.
health: Dedicate time to meditation or a relaxing activity to soothe your mind.
advice: Stay open to changes; they may bring beautiful surprises.
teaser: Clarity and organization on the agenda!
